commands.name: az dataprotection backup-policy create
commands.summary: Create a backup policy belonging to a backup vault.
examples: az dataprotection backup-policy create -g sarath-rg --vault-name sarath-vault -n mypolicy --policy policy.json

commands.name: az dataprotection backup-policy delete
commands.summary: Deletes a backup policy belonging to a backup vault.

commands.name: az dataprotection backup-policy get-default-policy-template
commands.summary: Get default policy template for a given datasource type.
commands.syntax: az dataprotection backup-policy get-default-policy-template --datasource-type {AzureBlob, AzureDatabaseForMySQL, AzureDatabaseForPostgreSQL, AzureDatabaseForPostgreSQLFlexibleServer, AzureDisk, AzureKubernetesService}

commands.name: az dataprotection backup-policy list
commands.summary: List list of backup policies belonging to a backup vault.

commands.name: az dataprotection backup-policy show
commands.summary: Get a backup policy belonging to a backup vault.

commands.name: az dataprotection backup-policy update
commands.summary: Update a backup policy belonging to a backup vault.
commands.syntax:
az dataprotection backup-policy update [--add]
                                       [--backup-policy-name]
                                       [--datasource-types]
                                       [--force-string {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                       [--ids]
                                       [--policy]
                                       [--remove]
                                       [--resource-group]
                                       [--set]
                                       [--subscription]
                                       [--vault-name]
